description.zh: X-Plane 插件智能安装工具

longDescription.zh: XFastInstall 是一款专为 X-Plane 飞行模拟器设计的插件安装工具。只需拖放文件即可自动识别并安装飞机、场景、插件和导航数据。智能检测嵌套插件并自动去重，避免重复安装。安装前会检测冲突并给出警告，让插件管理变得简单安全。支持常见的压缩包格式，Windows 用户还可以通过右键菜单快速安装。
longDescription.en: XFastInstall is an addon installer designed for X-Plane flight simulator. Simply drag and drop files to automatically detect and install Aircraft, Scenery, Plugins, and Navdata. Intelligently detects nested addons and removes duplicates to avoid redundant installations. Checks for conflicts before installation and provides warnings, making addon management simple and safe. Supports common archive formats, with Windows users able to install via right-click context menu.

features.zh: 智能检测飞机、场景、插件和导航数据
features.en: Smart detection of Aircraft, Scenery, Plugins, and Navdata

features.zh: 支持 .zip、.7z 和 .rar 压缩包
深度扫描和嵌套插件去重
features.en: Deep scan and nested addon deduplication

features.zh: Windows 右键菜单集成（可选）

description.zh: Zibo 737 智能更新管理工具

longDescription.zh: ZUpdater 是专为 Zibo 737 飞行模拟器模组开发的智能更新管理工具。自动检测、下载和安装最新的 Zibo 737 更新，避免繁琐的手动管理。支持快速更新、自动涂装备份等功能，让您的 Zibo 737 始终保持最新状态，享受最新的飞行体验和功能改进。
longDescription.en: ZUpdater is an intelligent update management tool designed specifically for the Zibo 737 flight simulator mod. Automatically detect, download, and install the latest Zibo 737 updates without the hassle of manual management. Features include quick updates, version management, one-click rollback, and more, ensuring your Zibo 737 stays up to date and you enjoy the latest flight experience and improvements.

features.zh: 自动检测、下载和安装 Zibo 737 最新更新
features.en: Automatic detection, download, and installation of latest Zibo 737 updates

features.zh: 一键快速更新，无需手动操作
features.en: One-click quick updates with no manual intervention

features.zh: 自动涂装备份，保护您的自定义涂装
features.en: Automatic livery backup to protect your custom liveries

features.zh: 完整的更新日志和版本历史查看
features.en: Complete update changelog and version history viewer

features.zh: 智能冲突检测和兼容性验证
features.en: Smart conflict detection and compatibility verification
